mapper.sql: id, branch_code, branch_name, tel, head, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, delete_flag, delete_time, delete_by
mapper.select: SELECT id, branch_code, branch_name, tel, head, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, delete_flag, delete_time, delete_by FROM reagent_branch WHERE branch_name = #{branchName} GROUP BY id
